text: As much as 27 sovereigns of gold jewellery, silver articles and Rs. 10,000 were burgled from a house in Lalitha Nagar in Madambakkam near Guduvanchery on Wednesday. Police said Jeyaraj (65) had returned home from a private hospital, after visiting his sick wife, only to find the main door broken and valuables burgled. —staff reporter
title: House burgled
